documents.name: Uk and EU privacy rights
documents.text:
UK &. EU PRIVACY RIGHTS

This privacy notice should be read in conjunction with our Privacy Policy.

How we use your personal data and your rights:
- When you visit, shop or register with Disney online or use any Disney online product, service or mobile application, your personal data is controlled by The Walt Disney Company Limited of 3 Queen Caroline Street, London, W6 9PE, United Kingdom.
- If you are a Disney+ service EU subscriber residing outside the United Kingdom, your personal data is also jointly controlled by The Walt Disney Company (Benelux) B.V., the provider of the Disney+ service.
- Your personal data is primarily used to provide you with the Disney products and services you request. It may also be used to comply with legal obligations we are subject to or to fulfill our legitimate interests, such as to personalize your experience, develop and improve our services or to detect illegal activities. With your prior consent, it may also be used to send you offers and promotions.
- You have a number of rights including the right to request access to, change, or remove your personal data, or to change your marketing preferences (including withdrawing your consent at any time) – please see our Privacy Policy to learn more about managing your marketing preferences or deleting your account.
- Our Data Protection Officer can be contacted by emailing: dataprotection@disney.co.uk.
- If you are in the EU, you may reach us through our local Representatives:
EU Representative
The Walt Disney Company
Benelux (BV)
De Passage 144
1101 AX Amsterdam
The Netherlands
- You have a right to lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Supervisory Authority or with the UK Information Commissioner’s Office: https://ico.org.uk/for-the-public.
- For more information about Disney’s data collection and use practices please read Disney’s Privacy Policy.

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
points.quoteText: You have a right to lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Supervisory Authority or with the UK Information Commissioner’s Office: https://ico.org.uk/for-the-public.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years of age
points.quoteText: You must be 18 years of age to purchase the Disney+ service.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
points.quoteText: We may also use cookies or other tracking technologies within our communications to you (for example to see if they have been read or opened or to see what content you interact with and what links you follow) so that we can better match future communications to your interests.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.quoteText: Updated: April 2, 2020

points.title: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information
points.quoteText: Disney+ will not be responsible for any losses arising from the unauthorized use of your Disney+ account, where such unauthorized use was not caused by Disney+.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
points.quoteText:
The Disney+ Service is provided to individuals for their personal use only.
Companies, associations and other groups may not register for a Disney+ account or use the Disney+ service.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
points.quoteText: - Information we obtain from a third party, such as a site or platform provider, about use of our applications on third-party platforms or devices;

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
points.quoteText: Your subscription to the Disney+ Service includes enrollment into an ongoing/recurring payment plan.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
points.quoteText: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your username and password and for all activities that occur on or through your Disney+ account.

points.title: The service can delete your account without a reason, but upon prior notice
points.quoteText: Disney+ may, in its sole discretion, terminate your subscription to the Disney+ Service at any time before the end of the current billing period or free trial upon prior notice, which may be communicated electronically.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.status: Unless they're caused by willful misconduct or they cause life or body damages; Disney+ shall not be liable for any losses or damages relating to the use of the service.
points.quoteText:
DISNEY+ SHALL BE FULLY LIABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH STATUTORY LAW FOR (A) DAMAGES CAUSED BY WILLFUL MISCONDUCT OR GROSS NEGLIGENCE, AND (B) DAMAGES TO LIFE, BODY OR HEALTH CAUSED BY WILLFUL MISCONDUCT, GROSS NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER FORMS OF NEGLIGENCE.

IN CASE DISNEY+ PROVIDES A PHYSICAL PRODUCT OR ELECTRICITY, DISNEY+ SHALL FURTHER BE FULLY LIABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE GERMAN PRODUCT LIABILITY ACT (PRODUKTHAFTUNGSGESETZ) OR OTHER LAWS TRANSPOSING COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 85/374/EEC.

DISNEY+ SHALL FURTHER BE LIABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH STATUTORY LAW FOR DAMAGES CAUSED BY SIMPLE NEGLIGENCE RESULTING IN A BREACH OF ANY CONTRACTUAL OBLIGATION THAT IS A PREREQUISITE FOR THE PROPER PERFORMANCE OF THIS AGREEMENT AND ON THE PROPER PERFORMANCE OF WHICH YOU COULD THEREFORE REASONABLY RELY (SO-CALLED ESSENTIAL OBLIGATION).

IN ALL OTHER CASES, THE LIABILITY OF DISNEY+ SHALL BE EXCLUDED.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
points.quoteText: - Send you offers and promotions for our products and services or third-party products and services;

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.quoteText: You can cancel your subscription to the Disney+ Service at any time before the end of the current billing period or free trial.

points.title: Private messages can be read
points.status: "In particular, we collect: [...] - Information sent either one-to-one or within a limited group using our message, chat, post, or similar functionality, where we are permitted by applicable law to collect this information;"
points.quoteText: - Information sent either one-to-one or within a limited group using our message, chat, post, or similar functionality, where we are permitted by applicable law to collect this information;

points.title: This service will warn users about website maintenance
points.quoteText: It is possible that the Disney+ Service and/or some or all Disney+ Content may not be available for streaming or downloading at any given time (i) during usual maintenance or update periods, (ii) any power or server outages beyond our control. (iii) as a result of war, riots, social unrest. or (iv) as a result of other matters beyond the control of us. Disney+ will take reasonable efforts to provide you with as much prior notice as possible.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
points.quoteText: vii. access, monitor or copy, or permit another person or entity to access, monitor or copy, any element of the Disney+ Service using a robot, spider, scraper or other automated means without our express written permission;

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
points.quoteText: Disney+ does not state that the Disney+ Content and the Disney+ Service will meet your requirements.

points.title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.
points.quoteText:
We may amend this Agreement (for price changes only section 2.a applies).
Any such amendment will be effective thirty (30) days following our notice to you in which we explain the amendment and the procedure for implementation of same and expressly notify you that the amendment will become effective if you do not inform us that you do not agree.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Netherlands
points.quoteText: This Disney+ Subscriber Agreement and any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with this Disney+ Subscriber Agreement are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.

points.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
points.quoteText: From time to time, we may change this privacy policy to accommodate new technologies, industry practices, regulatory requirements or for other purposes.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.quoteText:
We provide you the ability to exercise certain controls and choices regarding our collection, use and sharing of your information. In accordance with applicable law, your controls and choices may include:
- Correcting, updating, and deleting your registration account (Logout);

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.quoteText: - Choosing whether to receive from us offers and promotions for our products and services, or products and services that we think may be of interest to you;

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
points.quoteText: - Location information, including location information provided by a mobile or other device interacting with one of our sites, applications, or physical properties (including through beacon technologies), or associated with your IP address or other online or device identifier, where we are permitted by law to process this information;

points.title: Your biometric data is collected
points.quoteText:
- Still or video images captured by cameras or readers on or around our physical properties. and
- Call recordings when you call our reservation centers or other guest services phone numbers.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.quoteText: We operate globally and may transfer your personal information to individual companies of The Walt Disney Family of Companies or third parties in locations around the world for the purposes described in this privacy policy.

points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
points.quoteText: - Provide you with targeted advertising based on your activity on our sites and applications and on third-party sites and applications.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
points.quoteText: - Controlling targeted advertising from many ad networks and partners. data exchanges. and marketing analytics and digital advertising and marketing service providers (by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance);

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.quoteText:
- When companies perform services on our behalf, like package delivery, marketing and advertising, and customer service.
however, these companies are prohibited from using your personal information for purposes other than those requested by us or required by law.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting on users.
points.quoteText: - Usage, viewing, technical, and device data when you visit our sites, use our applications on third-party sites or platforms, or open emails we send, or connect with our wireless Internet access services and other similar technologies, including your browser or device type, unique device identifier, and IP address;

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
points.quoteText: HOW WE COLLECT YOUR INFORMATION

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
points.quoteText: We will retain your personal information for the length of time needed to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
points.quoteText: - When we share your personal information with third parties in connection with the sale of a business

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
points.quoteText:
We will not share your personal information with a third party outside The Walt Disney Family of Companies except in limited circumstances, including:
- When you allow us to share your personal information with another company, by electing to share your personal information with carefully selected companies so that they can send you offers and promotions about their products and services;

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
points.quoteText: Our targeted advertising cookies collect anonymous information. however, if you have a registration account with us, the information collected by us using our targeted advertising cookies may be associated with your registration account, for example, we may seek to show more closely targeted adverts to you based on your browsing behaviour.

points.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
points.quoteText:
FLASH COOKIES:

We may use local shared objects, sometimes known as Flash cookies, to store your preferences or display content based upon what you view on our site to personalize your visit. Our advertisers and third-party service providers also may use Flash cookies to collect and store information. Flash cookies are different from browser cookies because of the amount of, type of, and how data is stored. Cookie management tools provided by your browser will not remove Flash cookies.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.quoteText: We (or service providers operating on our behalf) may place our performance cookies on your device. The information collected using our performance cookies is used by us or for our benefit, to improve our website experience or for other statistics gathering purposes.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products
points.quoteText:
Our functionality cookies collect anonymous information.
however, if you have a registration account with us, the information collected by us using our functionality cookies may be associated with your registration account, for example, if you are a registered user, our functionality cookies may allow us to track your browsing across different websites operated by the Walt Disney Family of Companies or to detect your experiences when accessing our websites from different devices.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
points.quoteText: We also may allow third-party advertisers to place their performance cookies on your device through their advertisements on this website.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.quoteText: If you turn cookies off, you won’t have access to many features that make your guest experience more efficient and some of our services will not function properly.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
points.quoteText: USE OF YOUR INFORMATION BY THE WALT DISNEY FAMILY OF COMPANIES

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.quoteText: TYPES OF INFORMATION WE COLLECT

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
points.quoteText:
We use cookies to analyse your online behaviour so that we can operate and improve our services.
to communicate with you.
to personalise content or advertising on this or other platforms.
and provide social media features for you.

points.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
points.status: Tracking on third-party websites containing Disney+ products, whether you have an account or not.
points.quoteText: We collect information through a variety of technologies, such as cookies, Flash cookies, pixels, tags, software development kits, application program interfaces, and Web beacons, including when you visit our sites and applications or use our applications on third-party sites or platforms using one or more devices, whether or not you are logged in or registered.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.quoteText:
In particular, we collect:
- Registration information you provide when you create an account, enter a promotion, or link your profile on a third-party site or platform with your registration account, such as your first name and surname, country of residence, gender, date of birth, email address, username, and password;
- Transaction information you provide when you request information, contact Guest Services, or purchase, return, request, or exchange a product or service from us, such as your postal address, telephone number, and payment information;
- Information you provide in public forums on our sites and applications, such as your public posts;
